body:
A spell with buyback (well, any spell for that matter) should be countered when targeting a permanent that becomes sacrificed when targeted. (As long as it's the only target).

This isn't happening at the moment.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Sac When Targeted and Buyback
content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on May 21, 2014 21:40:39_

A spell with buyback (well, any spell for that matter) should be countered when targeting a permanent that becomes sacrificed when targeted. (As long as it's the only target).

This isn't happening at the moment.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=602_
